about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn the story behind Team PRI

story.p1: Team PRI was born with a clear purpose: to create exceptional digital experiences for the Brazilian market. From the beginning, our focus has always been to deliver high-quality projects, combining creative design and cutting-edge technical development.
story.p2: Over time, we built a solid track record, developing projects that transformed the digital presence of various companies in Brazil. Each delivery brought us more experience, confidence, and the certainty that we were on the right path.
story.p3: With so many successful deliveries and an increasingly robust portfolio, the time came to expand our horizons. We decided it was time to take our proposals beyond Brazil's borders, sharing our expertise and passion for what we do with clients around the world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Transform ideas into reality through design and technology, creating digital solutions that connect brands and people, whether in Brazil or anywhere in the world.

team.title: Young and Talented Team
team.description: We are three passionate professionals: one designer and two full-stack developers, united by the desire to create the best.

focus.title: Focus on Brazil
focus.description: Our journey began serving the Brazilian market, where we built our reputation with excellence in delivery.

expansion.title: International Expansion
expansion.description: Now we are ready to take our expertise to clients around the world, always maintaining the same commitment to quality.

testimonials.title: What they say about us

1.name: Maria Silva
1.text: Team PRI completely transformed our digital presence. The design and functionality exceeded all our expectations. I recommend without hesitation!

2.name: João Santos
2.text: Working with Team PRI was an incredible experience. Extremely competent and creative professionals. Our site became modern and performant.

3.name: Ana Costa
3.text: The Team PRI team perfectly understood our vision and transformed it into reality. The result was beyond what we imagined. Excellent work!
